pullRequest.title: Migrate to App Compat
pullRequest.bodyText:
Summary of Reference Changes:

android:* -> app:* in xml layouts
?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal -> @style/Base.Widget.AppCompat.ProgressBar.Horizontal
?android:attr/progressBarStyle -> @style/Base.Widget.AppCompat.ProgressBar
android.widget.SearchView ->  androidx.appcompat.widget.SearchView
ListPreference -> androidx.preference.ListPreference
Activity, FragmentActivity -> AppCompatActivity
android.app.AlertDialog -> androidx.appcompat.app.AlertDialog
getActionBar() -> getSupportActionBar()
menuItem::methodCall() -> MenuItemCompat.methodCall(menuItem) except setActionView(), getActionView as those methods are deprecated in MenuItemCompat and it's recommended to use these from MenuItem itself
android.app.ActionBar -> androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBar
getFragmentManager() -> getActivity().getSupportFragmentManager()
AutoCompleteTextView -> AppCompatAutoCompleteTextView
android.widget.ShareActionProvider -> androidx.appcompat.widget.ShareActionProvider
android.widget.ImageView -> androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView
android.widget.TextView -> androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView
android.widget.ImageButton -> androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageButton

Other Invisible Changes

Date Time widgets now inflates from xml layouts
Implements CommcareListActivity to replace android.app.ListActivity as there is no appCompat equivalent for it.
Removes some of the hard to migrate custom HONEYCOMB related code. Avoiding removing all HONEYCOMB related code to not clutter the PR, will follow up with that in a separate PR

Any Visible Functional Changes (Product Note)

Slight styling changes with views like EditText, Radio button selectors, Progress loading indicator now getting highlighted in accent color
Adopting TextAppearance.AppCompat.* styles for text views at several places causing minor changes in Text view sizes
Design change in switch for Mobile/Web user in "See Apps for my User" screen. Earlier the switch displayed both "Mobile user" and "web user" text while now there is just single text "Web User" corresponding to switch being turned on
slight style changes in calendar for date and time widget
Removes the CommCare Icon from the action bar (as per the material design guidenlines, we should only show either title or icon in the action bar, Most android apps seems to follow this design guideline as well)

commit.message: Moves Activity references to AppCompatActivity for non list activities
Creates ListActivity impl based on AppCompatActivity
Uses spinner mode for Date and Time Widgets
removed override as we don't have any 4.3 devices and onMenuItemSelected is final in AppCompat
Modify switch button to have text out of the switch itself as the switch button in app compat does not seem to support inline texts well
Search view fixes plus removes some pre honeycomb related code
Set edittext styling to material design default
handle activities with no action bar
turn on vecotr drawables support through support libs
Date time widget styling, show calendar true in date time
remove use of vector drawables on pre-21 devices as it doesn't not seem to support some edge cases like inflating in a custom view

nodes.bodyText: removed since text color is set as desired by itself.
titles are enabled by default with AppCompat, disabling them here for HorizontalPaneledChoiceDialog to keep them same as earlier.

commit.message: Makes uninstall button consistent with others

nodes.bodyText: confirming whether this is not needed?
wondering why are we removing the primary text color?
we can change this one as well to use textAppearance

commit.message: Removes spanned styling from context menu to avoid crash on < v18 devices, google issue #47831, #174626
removes dependency on internal android action bar view name
